trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around August 19th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsMY WIFE WOKE UP LATE THAT EVEING TO GET SOME COLD WATER OUT OF THE FRIG, SO AFTERWARDS SHE LOOK OUT THE FRONT DOOR WINDOW AND SAW THESE TWO VERY BRIGHT BALLS (THE SIZE OF A SOFTBALL) CHASING EACH OTHER AROUND THE TOP OF OUR VAN! THEY WERE GOING AROUND AND AROUND FOR QUITE AWHILE I SAY ABOUT 3 TO 4 MINUTES, THEN ALL OF A SUDDEN THEY TOOK OFF REAL FAST INTO THE NIGHT SKY! SHE DIDNT TELL ME ABOUT THIS FOR SOMETIME,SHE WAS SO BLOWN AWAY BY THIS AND SHE THOUGHT I WOULD WAS NUTS! SHE NOT ONE TO MAKE UP STORYS SHE IS VERY VERY HONEST, SHE NEVER BELIVED IN UFO BUT NOW SHE DOES! SHE WANTED TOO WAKE ME UP SO I COULD SEE IT,BUT SHE THOUGHT BY THE TIME SHE GOT ME IT WOULD BE GONE, SHE WAS RIGHT AFTER THE 3 TO 4 MIN THE TOO RIGHT OFF,SHE SAID THEY CHASE EACH OTHER AROUND VERY FAST AND VERY BRIGHT! THANK YOU! MR+MRS RONALD MENARD
